remarks: If two categories have the same hom-sets and composition, so do their opposites.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oppchomfpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Homf ` C ) = ( Homf ` D ) ) $.
oppccomfpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( comf ` C ) = ( comf ` D ) ) $.
oppccomfpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( comf ` ( oppCat ` C ) ) = ( comf ` ( oppCat ` D ) ) ) $.
